name: GlasgowComaScoreTotal
title: Glasgow Coma Score Total
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values is part of a neurological assessment tool-the Glasgow Coma Score.  The person performing the physical exam determines based on clinical judgment and Glasgow Coma Score parameters at what level the patient's Glasgow Coma Score Total is currently.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had physical exam performed which includes the Glasgow Coma Score Total.  Using the Quality Data Model, this element maps to the Physical, Exam: Performed datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set includes concepts that identify Glasgow Coma Score Total for the total score when all the components (Eye Opening, Motor Response, and Verbal) are added together.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
